data.lyric:
[ti:Take What You Want (feat. Ozzy Osbourne & Travis Scott)]
[ar:Post Malone/Ozzy Osbourne/Travis Scott]
[al:Hollywood’s Bleeding (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Take What You Want (feat. Ozzy Osbourne & Travis Scott) - Post Malone/Ozzy Osbourne/Travis Scott
[00:02.98]Post Malone：
[00:06.80]Oh
[00:10.57]Ozzy Osbourne：
[00:14.21]I feel you crumble in my arms down to your heart of stone
[00:21.00]You bled me dry just like the tears you never show
[00:26.96]Why don't you take what you want from me
[00:29.20]Take what you need from me
[00:30.92]Take what you want and go
[00:33.70]Why don't you take what you want from me
[00:36.02]Take what you need from me
[00:37.78]Take what you want and go
[00:39.71]Post Malone：
[00:40.62]I never needed anything from you
[00:44.04]And all I ever asked was for the truth
[00:47.42]You showed your tongue and it was forked in two
[00:50.39]Your venom was lethal I almost believed you
[00:53.83]Almost believed you
[00:54.44]Yeah you preyed on my every mistake
[00:57.02]Waited on me to break held me under hopin' I would drown
[01:01.14]Like a plague I was wasting away
[01:03.86]Tryna find my way out find my way out
[01:07.96]And it finally came the day
[01:12.10]I start giving my heart away
[01:15.20]For Heaven's sake my bones will break
[01:18.74]But you never own my soul no
[01:22.83]I feel you crumble in my arms down to your heart of stone
[01:29.56]You bled me dry just like the tears you never show
[01:35.43]Why don't you take what you want from me
[01:37.81]Take what you need from me
[01:39.44]Take what you want and go
[01:42.17]Why don't you take what you want from me
[01:44.62]Take what you need from me
[01:46.32]Take what you want and go
[01:48.26]Travis Scott：
[01:49.13]I took them stones you threw made chains for the crew
[01:52.03]Ice
[01:52.65]I brought up 10 h*es this coupe only made for two
[01:55.51]Yeah
[01:55.94]They all ran through it it ain't nothing left to do
[01:59.05]I need some more reasons to live out this evening
[02:02.50]Straight up
[02:03.01]I've been sippin' forever and just taking whatever
[02:06.55]Hoping thinking whenever you'll be back around
[02:09.76]Let's go our ways whichever
[02:11.68]You say how is however long
[02:13.53]'Cause you know I never be alone
[02:17.72]Love
[02:18.52]Love
[02:19.29]Shorty gon' back
[02:20.23]Shorty gon' back
[02:21.03]Need it on sight
[02:21.91]Need it on sight
[02:22.78]Crack it all back
[02:23.59]Crack it all back
[02:24.55]Give her that pipe
[02:25.29]Give her that pipe
[02:26.23]All of my cash
[02:27.07]All of my cash
[02:27.98]Shawty went bad
[02:28.78]Shawty went bad
[02:29.75]Ozzy Osbourne：
[02:31.32]I feel you crumble in my arms down to your heart of stone
[02:38.12]You bled me dry just like the tears you never show
[02:44.13]Why don't you take what you want from me
[02:46.33]Take what you need from me
[02:48.03]Take what you want and go
[02:50.84]Why don't you take what you want from me
[02:53.18]Take what you need from me
[02:54.90]Take what you want and go
[03:02.82]Post Malone：
[03:15.64]Take it all away
[03:25.12]Why don't you
[03:26.58]Take what you want take what you need
[03:29.42]Take what you need from me yeah
[03:33.39]Take what you want
[03:34.56]Why don't you
[03:35.32]Take what you need
[03:36.92]What you need yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Take What You Want (feat. Ozzy Osbourne & Travis Scott)]
[ar:Post Malone/Ozzy Osbourne/Travis Scott]
[al:Hollywood’s Bleeding (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.98]//
[00:06.80]//
[00:10.57]//
[00:14.21]我感觉你在我的怀里支离破碎 渐渐变得铁石心肠
[00:21.00]你榨干了我的血液 就像你不曾流过的眼泪
[00:26.96]你为何不从我这里拿走想要的一切
[00:29.20]从我这里拿走你想要的一切
[00:30.92]拿走你想要的一切 然后离我远远的
[00:33.70]你为何不从我这里拿走想要的一切
[00:36.02]从我这里拿走你想要的一切
[00:37.78]拿走你想要的一切 然后离我远远的
[00:39.71]//
[00:40.62]我从来没有要求过你什么
[00:44.04]从头到尾 我只想听你说真话
[00:47.42]你张开嘴巴 舌头分叉 就像毒蛇
[00:50.39]你的毒液 一滴致命 我差一点就相信了你
[00:53.83]差点相信你
[00:54.44]你利用我犯下的每一个错
[00:57.02]等着我崩溃 把我按在水中 希望让我窒息而死
[01:01.14]就像染了重疾 我日渐憔悴
[01:03.86]我想要找个出路
[01:07.96]这一天终于来了
[01:12.10]我渐渐抛弃我的心
[01:15.20]我的天哪 我恐怕会粉身碎骨
[01:18.74]但你从未拥有我的灵魂
[01:22.83]我感觉你在我的怀里支离破碎 渐渐变得铁石心肠
[01:29.56]你榨干了我的血液 就像你不曾流过的眼泪
[01:35.43]你为何不从我这里拿走想要的一切
[01:37.81]从我这里拿走你想要的一切
[01:39.44]拿走你想要的一切 然后离我远远的
[01:42.17]你为何不从我这里拿走想要的一切
[01:44.62]从我这里拿走你想要的一切
[01:46.32]拿走你想要的一切 然后离我远远的
[01:48.26]//
[01:49.13]你对我的伤害 我统统收下 将它们转化成强大的力量
[01:52.03]力量
[01:52.65]我带着十个女人 但这跑车只能坐两个人
[01:55.51]//
[01:55.94]她们都往里面挤 我也没有办法
[01:59.05]我需要别的理由来度过这个傍晚
[02:02.50]真的
[02:03.01]我不停地喝酒 有什么就喝什么
[02:06.55]期待着你回来的那一刻
[02:09.76]让我们走自己的路
[02:11.68]你说什么就是什么
[02:13.53]因为你知道 我害怕孤单
[02:17.72]亲爱的
[02:18.52]亲爱的
[02:19.29]她会回来的
[02:20.23]她会回来的
[02:21.03]想要她立刻回来
[02:21.91]想要她立刻回来
[02:22.78]挽回一切
[02:23.59]挽回一切
[02:24.55]给她幸福
[02:25.29]给她幸福
[02:26.23]我所有的财富
[02:27.07]我所有的财富
[02:27.98]她变得好可怕
[02:28.78]她变得好可怕
[02:29.75]//
[02:31.32]我感觉你在我的怀里支离破碎 渐渐变得铁石心肠
[02:38.12]你榨干了我的血液 就像你不曾流过的眼泪
[02:44.13]你为何不从我这里拿走想要的一切
[02:46.33]从我这里拿走你想要的一切
[02:48.03]拿走你想要的一切 然后离我远远的
[02:50.84]你为何不从我这里拿走想要的一切
[02:53.18]从我这里拿走你想要的一切
[02:54.90]拿走你想要的一切 然后离我远远的
[03:02.82]//
[03:15.64]夺走一切
[03:25.12]你为何不
[03:26.58]拿走你想要的一切
[03:29.42]从我这里拿走你想要的一切
[03:33.39]拿走你想要的一切
[03:34.56]你为什么不
[03:35.32]拿走你需要的一切
[03:36.92]你需要的一切
